00107     {

00134     public function setPagerLocation( $eValue )
00135     {
00136         //  Our class for paging...
00137         $_sClass = PS::o( $this->htmlOptions, 'class', $this->m_sPagerClass, true );
00138 
00139         //  Clear out duplicate types...
00140         if ( $eValue != $this->m_iPagerLocation )
00141             $_sClass = PS::removeClass( $_sClass, '/^ps-pager-/' );
00142             
00143         $this->m_iPagerLocation = $eValue;
00144         
00145         switch ( $eValue )
00146         {
00147             case PS::PL_TOP_RIGHT:
00148                 $_sClass = PS::addClass( $_sClass, array( 'ps-pager-right', 'ps-pager-top' )  );
00149                 break;
00150                 
00151             case PS::PL_BOTTOM_RIGHT:
00152                 $_sClass = PS::addClass( $_sClass, array( 'ps-pager-right', 'ps-pager-bottom' )  );
00153                 break;
00154                 
00155             case PS::PL_TOP_LEFT:
00156                 $_sClass = PS::addClass( $_sClass, array( 'ps-pager-left', 'ps-pager-top' )  );
00157                 break;
00158                 
00159             case PS::PL_BOTTOM_LEFT:
00160                 $_sClass = PS::addClass( $_sClass, array( 'ps-pager-left', 'ps-pager-bottom' )  );
00161                 break;
00162         }
00163         
00164         $this->htmlOptions['class'] = $_sClass;
00165     }
00166     
00171     public function run( $bReturnString = false )
00172     {
00173         if ( $this->nextPageLabel === null ) $this->nextPageLabel = Yii::t( 'yii', 'Next &gt;' );
00174         if ( $this->prevPageLabel === null ) $this->prevPageLabel = Yii::t( 'yii', '&lt; Previous' );
00175         if ( $this->firstPageLabel === null ) $this->firstPageLabel = Yii::t( 'yii', '&lt;&lt; First' );
00176         if ( $this->lastPageLabel === null ) $this->lastPageLabel = Yii::t( 'yii', 'Last &gt;&gt;' );
00177         
00178         if ( $this->header === null ) $this->header = Yii::t( 'yii', 'Go to page: ' );
00179 
00180         $_sButtons = $this->createPageButtons();
00181 
00182         if ( empty( $_sButtons ) ) return;
00183 
00184         $this->registerClientScript();
00185 
00186         $_arHtmlOptions = $this->htmlOptions;
00187         $_arHtmlOptions['id'] = PS::o( $_arHtmlOptions, 'id', $this->getId() );
00188         $_arHtmlOptions['class'] = PS::o( $_arHtmlOptions, 'class', $this->m_sPagerClass );
00189         
00190         $_sOut = '<div class="ps-button-bar">';
00191             $_sOut .= $this->header;
00192             $_sOut .= PS::tag( 'ul', $_arHtmlOptions, implode( "\n", $_sButtons ) );
00193             $_sOut .= $this->footer;
00194         $_sOut .= '</div>';
00195         
00196         //  Return results?
00197         if ( $bReturnString ) return $_sOut;
00198         
00199         //  Otherwise just echo...
00200         echo $_sOut;
00201     }

00217     protected function createPageButton( $sLabel, $iPage, $sClass, $bHidden, $bSelected )
00218     {
00219         $_sIcon = null;
00220         $_sLinkClass = "ps-button ui-corner-all";
00221         
00222         //  If we have an icon mapping for this button, add it to the link...
00223         if ( isset( $this->m_arIcons, $this->m_arIcons ) && count( $this->m_arIcons[ $sClass ] ) )
00224         {
00225             $_sIconName = $this->m_arIcons[ $sClass ][ 'icon' ];
00226             $_sIconPosition = 'ps-button-icon-' . $this->m_arIcons[ $sClass ][ 'position' ];
00227             $_sIcon = '<span class="ui-icon ui-icon-' . $_sIconName . '"></span>';
00228             $_sLinkClass .= ' '. $_sIconPosition;
00229         }
00230         
00231         //  Add marker class to list element so it can be styled...
00232         $sClass .= ' ps-link-pager';
00233         
00234         //  Hidden or selected? Class it up...
00235         if ( $bHidden || $bSelected ) $sClass .= ' ' . ( $bHidden ? self::CSS_HIDDEN_PAGE : self::CSS_SELECTED_PAGE );
00236         $_sLinkClass .= ( $bSelected ? ' ui-state-active' : ' ui-state-default' );
00237         
00238         return '<li class="' . $sClass . '">' . CHtml::link( $_sIcon . $sLabel, $this->createPageUrl( $iPage ), array( 'class' => $_sLinkClass ) ) . '</li>';
00239     }
